data.message: Someone has duplicated my account and I can't figure out how to have it stop.  My friends are getting friend requests as well as ads.  Please have someone call me

replies.message: Hey Katrina. If someone created a Facebook account pretending to be you, please report the profile from a computer. Learn about how to request information about an impostor account: https://www.facebook.com/help/www/117152291702875. -Sarah
I have tried and I cant locate it.
Someone needs to contact me directly from Facebook since I can't locate a number to call you.
The link you sent me tells me to contact law inforcement.  REALLY?
Facebook better get it together they are losing our confidence and soon they will be a part oh History I already see it happening with the younger generation
Let's be honest here, Facebook doesn't help hacked/created pages for charity groups or awareness, they aren't going to help other users either.
